name: Extrude Text in Z Space - Isometric view - Sudo 3d
description:
Neon Gradient that follows the shape, it's an illusion not real 3d.


Whats really happening here is - we are stacking same text on top of each other. This results it to look like 3d, gap between two layers is ver less.


Download and inspect carefully, you may learn a few techniques. I enjoyed a lot.


Thank you.
